articles.author: Craig Taylor
articles.title: Boucher bombshell: Proteas coach to step down after T20 World Cup
articles.description: Cricket South Africa (CSA) dropped a bombshell on Monday with the news that Proteas head coach Mark Boucher will step down from his role after the 2022 T20 World Cup set to take place in Australia in October.
articles.content: Cricket South Africa (CSA) dropped a bombshell on Monday with the news that Proteas head coach Mark Boucher will step down from his role after the 2022 T20 World Cup set to take place in Australia in… [+2434 chars]

articles.title: England show game is about glory in remarkable summer
articles.description: England won six of seven Tests this summer - but the glorious way they played the game was even more important, says chief cricket writer Stephan Shemilt.
articles.content:
Is sport only about winning?
Tottenham Hotspur great Danny Blanchflower once said: "The great fallacy is that the game is first and last about winning. It's nothing of the kind. 
"The game is about… [+6071 chars]

articles.title: PCB hands Umar Akmal three-year ban from all cricket | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Penalty after the batsman pleaded guilty to not reporting corrupt approaches | ESPNcricinfo.com

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
